description: Try our easy to follow Indian Banana Skin Chutney recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chutney,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Indian Banana Skin Chutney Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 green apples, peeled, cored, chopped into 1cm chunks

recipeInstructions.text: In a dry frying pan, toast mustard and cumin seeds over medium-high heat for about 4 minutes or until fragrant. Cool. Transfer to a mortar and pestle and crush coarsely. Stir in ginger, cracked pepper, turmeric and cardamom and set aside.

Combine sugar and vinegar in a medium saucepan. Stir over medium heat for 5 minutes or until sugar dissolves. Bring to the boil, reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until thick and syrupy.
Stir in spices until combined. Add onion, banana peel and apple. Simmer for 15 minutes or until fruit is soft. Remove from heat and stir in sultanas. Cool completely.
Transfer to a sterilised jar, cover and refrigerate for 1 day for flavours to develop. Serve with a cheese platter.
